Pigs for parallel compressionhttp://localhost:3000/notes/pigs-for-parallel-compression/Mon, 02 Jun 2014 00:00:00 +0000http://localhost:3000/notes/pigs-for-parallel-compression/Compress tar -c --use-compress-program=pigz -f someDir.tar.gz someDir/ DeCompress pigz -dc someDir.tar.gz | tar xf -
